speaker:  Ned Stark
saying: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

speaker:  Jaime Lannister
saying: The things I do for love.

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

speaker:  Cersei
saying: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.

speaker:  Ned Stark
saying: I grew up with soldiers. I learned how to die a long time ago.

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.

speaker:  Joffrey
saying: Everyone is mine to torment.

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: The day will come when you think you are safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.

speaker:  Melisandre
saying: The night is dark and full of terrors.

speaker:  Ygritte
saying: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

speaker:  Various members of the Night's Watch
saying: Night gathers, and now my watch begins

speaker:  Various Lannisters
saying: A Lannister always pays his debts.

speaker:  Aerys II Targaryen
saying: Burn them all!

speaker:  Syrio Forel
saying: What do we say to the God of death?

speaker:  Bronn
saying: There's no cure for being a c*nt.

speaker:  Brynden Tully
saying: I've seen wet shits I like better than Walder Frey.

speaker:  Pretty much everyone
saying: Winter is coming

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: That's what I do: I drink and I know things.

speaker:  Daenerys
saying: I am the dragon's daughter, and I swear to you that those who would harm you will die screaming.

speaker:  Tywin
saying: A lion does not concern himself with the opinion of sheep.

speaker:  Littlefinger
saying: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

speaker:  Varys
saying: Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick; a shadow on the wall.

speaker:  The Hound
saying: I understand that if any more words come pouring out your c*nt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every f*cking chicken in this room.

speaker:  Ramsay
saying: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.

speaker:  Tywin
saying: I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

speaker:  Cersei
saying: If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.

speaker:  Arya
saying: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell. And I'm going home.

speaker:  Tywin
saying: Any man who must say 'I am the King' is no true King.

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: Oh, monster? Perhaps you should speak to me more softly then. Monsters are dangerous and just now Kings are dying like flies.

speaker:  Jaime
saying: Jaime... my name's Jaime.

speaker:  Tyrion
saying: I am your son. I have always been your son.

speaker:  Samwell Tarly
saying: I read it in a book.

speaker:  Jon Snow
saying: If I fall, don't bring me back.

speaker:  Varys
saying: The big fish eat the little fish and I keep on paddling.

speaker:  Daenerys
saying: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell... they're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that one's on top, and on and on it spins, crushing those on the ground.

speaker:  Wylis/Hodor
saying: Hold the door!

speaker:  Lyanna Mormont
saying: I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me.

speaker:  Arya
saying: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

speaker:  Lady Olenna
saying: He really was a c*nt, wasn't he?

speaker:  Davos Seaworth
saying: Nothing f*cks you harder than time.

speaker:  Jon Snow
saying: There is only one war that matters. The Great War. And it is here.
